medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient began to feel generalized abdominal discomfort at 7pm and was woken up with pain more focal in the right lower quadrant at midnight. She denies nausea/vomiting, fevers, chills, or changes in bowel habits. No similar episodes in the past.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of multiple episodes of diverticulitis every year; hypertension, esophageal reflux.
